alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 31 at 10:16AM CDT until April 01 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Wilcox, Dallas and Monroe Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 66.0 feet, Farm and pasturelands in the area will flood and cattle should be moved to higher ground. At 68.0 feet, Millers Ferry Park begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 67.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue to fall, falling below flood stage late tonight. The river is then forecast to continue falling to a stage of 43.3 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 66.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
